column1: Local Foods////Had the Smoked Salmon here with pumpkin seeds and fruit (watermelon). The Smoked Salmon was served with arugula
column3: and cream cheese. Everything was very good. The bagel was light
column4: cream cheese cold and spread well
column5: and salmon not overpowering. A solid place to eat with friends or family and you want a guaranteed good meal. The staff was respectful but our cashier kept picking up the phone every few seconds to answer calls when we were trying to order. I understand that this is a function of Local Foods being a popular place to eat but it still felt wrong. Great place!
